Commentaire: Beaucoup de choix pour faire plaisir au plus près des préférences de chacun, prix très raisonnable,  livraison ultra rapide !....et date à respecter assez lointaine pour ne pas rater!

Déçu, j'ai commandé une box uniquement disponible sur le site,"un gars en or" je reçois une box noir avec des étoiles.. c'est pas du tout le modèle proposé sur votre site !!! même si a intérieur il y le folder papier correspondant, très déçu car c'est un cadeau qui n'aura pas le même effet !!!Je ne commanderai plus jamais vos box en ligne !!!

Nous avons suivi les instructions et payé 20 euros de supplément pour finalement voir sur le site de l'hôtel qu'il n'y a pas de disponibilité. Nous ne pouvons pas prendre de congés quand nous le souhaitons donc pour l'instant, ces 20 euros sont perdus, ça fait deux fois qu'on nous offre une box de chez vous et deux fois déçus, je vais informer ceux qui offrent que Wonderbox ce n'est franchement pas pour nous.
Le wonderbox nous a permis de découvrir cette adresse exceptionnelle qui prévoit un menu spécifique wonderbox. Pas de surprise, sinon positive. Tout était soigné et délicieux !

J'ai reçu en cadeau une wonderbox avec, à l'intérieur, un code d'enregistrement.Et bien cela ne suffit pas.Il vous faut introduire une preuve d'achat.Vous devinez à quel point cela peut être délicat de la réclamer si le cadeau ne vient pas d'une personne proche.Wonderbox me parle d'un duplicata que je peux obtenir et fournit le magasin où mon bon a été acheté.Après avoir téléphoné au magasin, j'apprends qu'il faut en plus la date de l'achat.Tant de démarches pour bénéficier de son cadeau, c'est de l'arnaque.Car au pis, le code avait été activé préalablement (ce qui n'était pas le cas) et à ce moment, on peut comprendre la démarche mais si ce n'est pas le cas...
Commande et réception ultra rapide C est vraiment parfait je recommanderai c est certain Site sécurisé et très pro Merci bcp

Passez votre chemin, c'est à la limite de l'arnaque. Comme d'autres commentaires le disent, impossible de réserver un hotel ni de savoir si un hotel est disponible, par contre Wonderbox se fait un plaisir d'accepter votre argent pour augmenter votre wonderbox pour un meilleur hotel même si ce dernier va refuser tout simplement votre réservation. Sans oublier les mois qu'il faudra pour vous faire rembourser cet argent dépensé inutilement. (4 mois pour l'instant et je compte toujours, après multiple relance)N'oublions surtout pas le service client par téléphone qui n'est autre qu'un robot qui vous raccroche au nez (aucune personne réelle au bout du fil)...
Reponse: Bonjour Thomas,Nous regrettons de lire les désagréments que vous rencontrez pour utiliser votre Wonderbox.Afin de pouvoir vous accompagner au mieux, pourriez-vous nous envoyer plus de détails de votre situation (adresse e-mail, numéro de chèque et partenaire souhaité) à l'adresse : mediator-be@wonderbox.com.Merci à vous,L'Equipe Wonderbox

Commentaire: Je pensais avoir un beau coffret avec explications mais c est très réduit Comme c était pour 1 cadeau je trouve que les coffrets d avant étaient mieux
Proposition de basses qualité, les hôtels refuse les chambres dé l'annonce du mot "Wonderbox". Bref nous en avons reçue une et alors faire en sorte de pouvoir l'utiliser mais... Cadeau a éviter !
Très pratique, achat en ligne et reçu rapidement par mail. idéal pour un cadeau de dernière minuteJuste dommage d'avoir reçu mon code cadeau après avoir finaliser la transaction
Je n’ai rencontré aucun soucis
Je n'ai pas encore utilisé mon wonderbox, je l'ai juste échangé. Je remercie vivement la personne qui m'a aidée.

Il n y a pas moyen de réserver directement avec un calendrier des disponibilités.De plus, tous les lieux auxquels j ai envoyé un mail pour réservation répondent qu il n'y a pas de possibilités de réservation alors que, sur leur site propre, des chambres sont encore disponibles. Après la saison me disent ils, en septembre....
Livraison rapide.Par contre, je m'attendais à recevoir la boîte telle qu'elle apparaît sur le site. Ben en fait, on reçoit juste une boîte noire avec des feuillets à l'intérieur. Dommage.
Échange facile et rapide pour nous permettre d'avoir ce que l'on veut vraimentGrand choix intéressant
Moins de 48h entre la commande et la livraison. Excellent service, merci.

Je suis très très déçue de cette achat, partout où nous téléphonont pour la réservation avec notre Wonderbox nous sommes refoulé parce que les établissements ne prennent les Wonderbox que la semaine et pas le weekend ! Nous travaillons tout les 2 et donc notre achat était pour profiter le weekend. Nous sommes appris et n achèterons plus jamais de Wonderbox ! Ce qui est très dommage parce que nous sommes des adeptes de petits weekend en amoureux nous nous marions l année prochaine et nous avions suggéré ce genre de cadeau mais nous changeons d avis !
C'était super facile de faire une commande en ligne.
Suite à un souci avec le fournisseur de service, réaction rapide de Wonderbox pour trouver une solution. Echange effectué.

Sans conteste le meilleur service de bons de loisirs, accepte de prolonger la validité gratuitement (contrairement à son plus grand concurrent) et de plus il était périmé de quelques jours. Je retire une étoile uniquement parce que l'application tout comme le site internet sont très mal conçus et fonctionnent très mal, mais c'est encore pire chez leur concurent ! Géo-localisation pas respecté, filtres insuffisants et fastidieux, recherche par nom sans résultat alors que cela fait partie des choix possibles et j'en passe, c'est certainement une bandes de bras cassés et de pauvres cerveaux qui s'occupent de la conception.

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client
J'ai un coupon de réduction qui n' jamais voulu marcher
Reponse: Bonjour cher Client, Je suis navré de lire votre déception concernant l'utilisation de votre code de réduction.Afin de vous trouver une solution, pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, une photo du coupon ainsi que votre adresse mail. Cordialement, Ali de Wonderbox

Commentaire: Very warm welcoming and family experience orientated, in a beautiful farm and rural setting. Very good experience and well looked after. Will definitely come back! Margarida
Not possible to get refund... experience are too expensive... website and app are not working... i cannot understand the positive comments
Reponse: Hello Jules Imbert,I'm sorry to read your disappointment with Wonderbox.We place great importance on our offer quality and our customers reviews and feelings. Could you please directly contact the mediator using the following email address : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.Do not forget to transmit your story, your voucher number and your email address.It will allow him to send you a personalized answer. Best regards,Paloma de Wonderbox-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Bonjour Jules Imbert,Je suis navrée de lire votre déception concernant votre expérience avec Wonderbox .Nous attachons une grande importance à la qualité de nos offres et au ressenti de nos clients. Pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, votre numéro de chèque-cadeau et votre adresse mail.Cela permettra de vous apporter une réponse personnaliséeCordialement,Paloma de Wonderbox

Commentaire: J’ai pris plus de 600& de box j’aurai aimer un bonus client plus important qu un album photo
Reponse: Bonjour cher client,Je suis navrée de lire votre message.Afin de vous apporter une réponse personnalisée, pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr. Surtout, n’oubliez pas de lui faire part de votre récit, le numéro de votre chèque-cadeau ou de votre commande.Je vous remercie et vous souhaite une agréable journée,Sophie de Wonderbox

Commentaire: I purchased 3 packages for Guingamp football club  (total 6 tickets) through wonderbox. These tickets were valid for 19 matches. March when my grandson came for his holiday I tried to order the 6 tickets for my family but the guingamp tickets had been removed from the wonderbox so I had to go direct to Guingamp football club and purchase  the ticketsI have tried to get a refund  but they refused and said I would have to contact  ticketnet and after contacting ticketnet they said I would have to contact wonderbox. This is making me feel ill, if the product has been withdrawn an unavailable, it should be refunded
Reponse: Hello dear customer,I'm sorry to read your feedback.In order to find a solution, I invite you to contact the mediator at this e-mail address : mediateur@wonderbox.fr.Don't forget to give him your e-mail address linked to your customer account and your gift voucher number.Best regards,Ali from Wonderbox

Commentaire: Box commandee et 7  jrs apres ne recevant rien, j appelle et l on m informe rupture de stock !!!
Wonderbox loisirs en duo utilisée au restaurant Les Vignes du Liban à Paris.Accueil, restauration et services excellents.
Super facile d'échanger ou de prolonger sa box
Simple et rapide
merci d'avoir pu prolonger ma box maintenant, il suffit de choisir le resto.

Super facile d'échanger ou de prolonger sa box
Simple et rapide
merci d'avoir pu prolonger ma box maintenant, il suffit de choisir le resto.
Tres bon produit mais il n'etait pas disponible en version electronique.
Reponse: Bonjour Krys,Je vous informe que les Supercard ne peuvent pas être en version électrique, car vous aurez besoin de la carte physique pour l'utiliser.Je vous remercie et vous souhaite une agréable journée,Sophie de Wonderbox

Commentaire: prolongation d'une wonderbox, très simple, il suffit de suivre vos instructions
Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client
J'ai un coupon de réduction qui n' jamais voulu marcher
Reponse: Bonjour cher Client, Je suis navré de lire votre déception concernant l'utilisation de votre code de réduction.Afin de vous trouver une solution, pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, une photo du coupon ainsi que votre adresse mail. Cordialement, Ali de Wonderbox

Commentaire: Very warm welcoming and family experience orientated, in a beautiful farm and rural setting. Very good experience and well looked after. Will definitely come back! Margarida
Not possible to get refund... experience are too expensive... website and app are not working... i cannot understand the positive comments
Reponse: Hello Jules Imbert,I'm sorry to read your disappointment with Wonderbox.We place great importance on our offer quality and our customers reviews and feelings. Could you please directly contact the mediator using the following email address : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.Do not forget to transmit your story, your voucher number and your email address.It will allow him to send you a personalized answer. Best regards,Paloma de Wonderbox-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Bonjour Jules Imbert,Je suis navrée de lire votre déception concernant votre expérience avec Wonderbox .Nous attachons une grande importance à la qualité de nos offres et au ressenti de nos clients. Pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, votre numéro de chèque-cadeau et votre adresse mail.Cela permettra de vous apporter une réponse personnaliséeCordialement,Paloma de Wonderbox

Commentaire: J’ai pris plus de 600& de box j’aurai aimer un bonus client plus important qu un album photo
Reponse: Bonjour cher client,Je suis navrée de lire votre message.Afin de vous apporter une réponse personnalisée, pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr. Surtout, n’oubliez pas de lui faire part de votre récit, le numéro de votre chèque-cadeau ou de votre commande.Je vous remercie et vous souhaite une agréable journée,Sophie de Wonderbox

Commentaire: I purchased 3 packages for Guingamp football club  (total 6 tickets) through wonderbox. These tickets were valid for 19 matches. March when my grandson came for his holiday I tried to order the 6 tickets for my family but the guingamp tickets had been removed from the wonderbox so I had to go direct to Guingamp football club and purchase  the ticketsI have tried to get a refund  but they refused and said I would have to contact  ticketnet and after contacting ticketnet they said I would have to contact wonderbox. This is making me feel ill, if the product has been withdrawn an unavailable, it should be refunded
Reponse: Hello dear customer,I'm sorry to read your feedback.In order to find a solution, I invite you to contact the mediator at this e-mail address : mediateur@wonderbox.fr.Don't forget to give him your e-mail address linked to your customer account and your gift voucher number.Best regards,Ali from Wonderbox

Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client

Best regards,Paloma de Wonderbox-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Bonjour Jules Imbert,Je suis navrée de lire votre déception concernant votre expérience avec Wonderbox .Nous attachons une grande importance à la qualité de nos offres et au ressenti de nos clients. Pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, votre numéro de chèque-cadeau et votre adresse mail.Cela permettra de vous apporter une réponse personnaliséeCordialement,Paloma de Wonderbox

Commentaire: I purchased 3 packages for Guingamp football club  (total 6 tickets) through wonderbox. These tickets were valid for 19 matches. March when my grandson came for his holiday I tried to order the 6 tickets for my family but the guingamp tickets had been removed from the wonderbox so I had to go direct to Guingamp football club and purchase  the ticketsI have tried to get a refund  but they refused and said I would have to contact  ticketnet and after contacting ticketnet they said I would have to contact wonderbox. This is making me feel ill, if the product has been withdrawn an unavailable, it should be refunded
Reponse: Hello dear customer,I'm sorry to read your feedback.In order to find a solution, I invite you to contact the mediator at this e-mail address : mediateur@wonderbox.fr.Don't forget to give him your e-mail address linked to your customer account and your gift voucher number.Best regards,Ali from Wonderbox

Commentaire: prolongation d'une wonderbox, très simple, il suffit de suivre vos instructions
Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client

Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme

Surtout, n’oubliez pas de lui faire part de votre récit, le numéro de votre chèque-cadeau ou de votre commande.Je vous remercie et vous souhaite une agréable journée,Sophie de Wonderbox

Commentaire: I purchased 3 packages for Guingamp football club  (total 6 tickets) through wonderbox. These tickets were valid for 19 matches. March when my grandson came for his holiday I tried to order the 6 tickets for my family but the guingamp tickets had been removed from the wonderbox so I had to go direct to Guingamp football club and purchase  the ticketsI have tried to get a refund  but they refused and said I would have to contact  ticketnet and after contacting ticketnet they said I would have to contact wonderbox. This is making me feel ill, if the product has been withdrawn an unavailable, it should be refunded
Reponse: Hello dear customer,I'm sorry to read your feedback.In order to find a solution, I invite you to contact the mediator at this e-mail address : mediateur@wonderbox.fr.Don't forget to give him your e-mail address linked to your customer account and your gift voucher number.Best regards,Ali from Wonderbox

Commentaire: Box commandee et 7  jrs apres ne recevant rien, j appelle et l on m informe rupture de stock !!!
Wonderbox loisirs en duo utilisée au restaurant Les Vignes du Liban à Paris.Accueil, restauration et services excellents.
Super facile d'échanger ou de prolonger sa box
Simple et rapide
merci d'avoir pu prolonger ma box maintenant, il suffit de choisir le resto.
Tres bon produit mais il n'etait pas disponible en version electronique.
Reponse: Bonjour Krys,Je vous informe que les Supercard ne peuvent pas être en version électrique, car vous aurez besoin de la carte physique pour l'utiliser.Je vous remercie et vous souhaite une agréable journée,Sophie de Wonderbox

Commentaire: prolongation d'une wonderbox, très simple, il suffit de suivre vos instructions
Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client
J'ai un coupon de réduction qui n' jamais voulu marcher
Reponse: Bonjour cher Client, Je suis navré de lire votre déception concernant l'utilisation de votre code de réduction.Afin de vous trouver une solution, pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, une photo du coupon ainsi que votre adresse mail. Cordialement, Ali de Wonderbox

Commentaire: Very warm welcoming and family experience orientated, in a beautiful farm and rural setting. Very good experience and well looked after. Will definitely come back! Margarida
Not possible to get refund... experience are too expensive... website and app are not working... i cannot understand the positive comments
Reponse: Hello Jules Imbert,I'm sorry to read your disappointment with Wonderbox.We place great importance on our offer quality and our customers reviews and feelings. Could you please directly contact the mediator using the following email address : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.Do not forget to transmit your story, your voucher number and your email address.It will allow him to send you a personalized answer. Best regards,Paloma de Wonderbox-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Bonjour Jules Imbert,Je suis navrée de lire votre déception concernant votre expérience avec Wonderbox .Nous attachons une grande importance à la qualité de nos offres et au ressenti de nos clients. Pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, votre numéro de chèque-cadeau et votre adresse mail.Cela permettra de vous apporter une réponse personnaliséeCordialement,Paloma de Wonderbox

Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.

Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client

Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client

Best regards,Paloma de Wonderbox-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Bonjour Jules Imbert,Je suis navrée de lire votre déception concernant votre expérience avec Wonderbox .Nous attachons une grande importance à la qualité de nos offres et au ressenti de nos clients. Pouvez-vous, s’il vous plait, contacter le médiateur directement à l’adresse suivante : wonderhelp@wonderbox.fr.N’oubliez pas de lui transmettre votre récit, votre numéro de chèque-cadeau et votre adresse mail.Cela permettra de vous apporter une réponse personnaliséeCordialement,Paloma de Wonderbox

Commentaire: I purchased 3 packages for Guingamp football club  (total 6 tickets) through wonderbox. These tickets were valid for 19 matches. March when my grandson came for his holiday I tried to order the 6 tickets for my family but the guingamp tickets had been removed from the wonderbox so I had to go direct to Guingamp football club and purchase  the ticketsI have tried to get a refund  but they refused and said I would have to contact  ticketnet and after contacting ticketnet they said I would have to contact wonderbox. This is making me feel ill, if the product has been withdrawn an unavailable, it should be refunded
Reponse: Hello dear customer,I'm sorry to read your feedback.In order to find a solution, I invite you to contact the mediator at this e-mail address : mediateur@wonderbox.fr.Don't forget to give him your e-mail address linked to your customer account and your gift voucher number.Best regards,Ali from Wonderbox

Commentaire: prolongation d'une wonderbox, très simple, il suffit de suivre vos instructions
Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client

Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme

Commentaire: I purchased 3 packages for Guingamp football club  (total 6 tickets) through wonderbox. These tickets were valid for 19 matches. March when my grandson came for his holiday I tried to order the 6 tickets for my family but the guingamp tickets had been removed from the wonderbox so I had to go direct to Guingamp football club and purchase  the ticketsI have tried to get a refund  but they refused and said I would have to contact  ticketnet and after contacting ticketnet they said I would have to contact wonderbox. This is making me feel ill, if the product has been withdrawn an unavailable, it should be refunded
Reponse: Hello dear customer,I'm sorry to read your feedback.In order to find a solution, I invite you to contact the mediator at this e-mail address : mediateur@wonderbox.fr.Don't forget to give him your e-mail address linked to your customer account and your gift voucher number.Best regards,Ali from Wonderbox

Commentaire: prolongation d'une wonderbox, très simple, il suffit de suivre vos instructions
Le restaurant est excellent.   Le menu, laccueil,  le service.
None
Bon accueil, très bon massage

The accommodation is spotlessly clean and the hostess is very friendly. The evening meal met my specific dietary requirements (allergy to eggs) and was well cooked. It was tasty and best described as home cooking rather than fine dining. We had been informed in advance that there was a 10 euro supplement per person for drinks, which turned out to be a glass of rum punch, a carafe of red wine (between 4 of us) and a bottle of water. I felt that we were overcharged in this respect. Breakfast consisted of fruit juice, coffee, a croissant, bread and jam plus plain yoghurt. The baked items were fresh and delicious.
Pas d surprise au restaurant bo. Service et menu conforme
Pas content
It was a great experience to eat in one of the oldests restaurant in Paris. All the arts and paintings through the restaurant makes it very charming. The food was also very very good.
Très bon service client
